item.title: OpenWRT Receive HKC Alarm Events and Forward via SMS
item.description:
This solution consists of an OpenWRT-powered router connected to the printer serial port of an HKC alarm via a USB-to-serial adapter. The main script parses messages, and if they are deemed interesting, forwards the message via SMS to a designated contact. A cron job executes a keep alive script to verify the main script is running and executes it if not.

Main script - HKC.sh

#!/bin/ash # Setup port to read from HKC alarm printer output stty -F /dev/ttyUSB0 raw 2400 # Constants CONFIG_FILE="/etc/HKC_config.txt" # Functions...
